abilities.name: Special Equipment.
abilities.description: Azbara has two scrolls of mage armor.

abilities.name: Potent Cantrips.
abilities.description: When Azbara casts an evocation Cantrips and misses, or the target succeeds on its saving throw, the target still takes half the cantrip's damage but suffers no other effect.

abilities.name: Sculpt Spells.
abilities.description: When Azbara casts an evocation spell that affects other creatures that he can see, he can choose a number of them equal to 1+the spell's level to succeed on their saving throws against the spell. Those creatures take no damage if they would normally take half damage from the spell.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Azbara is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Azbara has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
* Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp
* 1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
* 2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, misty step, scorching ray
* 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, fireball
